mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_ID, O.ORDER_NAME, O.ORDER_STAT, O.PRODUCT_NAME, O.REMARKS, O.COMPANY_NAME, O.BIZ_TYPE, (SELECT COUNT(L.ORDER_LIST_ID) FROM TB_BATCH_ORDER_LIST L WHERE L.DATA_STAT = '0' AND L.ORDER_ID = O.ORDER_ID) AS ORDERCOUNT, (SELECT COUNT(L.ORDER_LIST_ID) FROM TB_BATCH_ORDER_LIST L WHERE L.DATA_STAT = '0' AND L.ORDER_ID = O.ORDER_ID AND L.ORDER_STAT = '0') AS DISPOSEWAIT, (SELECT COUNT(L.ORDER_LIST_ID) FROM TB_BATCH_ORDER_LIST L WHERE L.DATA_STAT = '0' AND L.ORDER_ID = O.ORDER_ID AND L.ORDER_STAT = '00') AS DISPOSESUCCESS, (SELECT COUNT(L.ORDER_LIST_ID) FROM TB_BATCH_ORDER_LIST L WHERE L.DATA_STAT = '0' AND L.ORDER_ID = O.ORDER_ID AND L.ORDER_STAT = '99') AS DISPOSEFAIL, (SELECT SUM(L.AMOUNT) FROM TB_BATCH_ORDER_LIST L WHERE L.DATA_STAT = '0' AND L.ORDER_ID = O.ORDER_ID) AS SUMAMOUNT FROM TB_BATCH_ORDER O WHERE O.DATA_STAT = '0' AND O.ORDER_ID= #{orderId}

SELECT O.ORDER_ID, O.PRODUCT_CODE, O.PRODUCT_NAME, O.ORDER_NAME, O.ORDER_TYPE, O.ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_STAT, O.DATA_STAT, O.REMARKS, O.CREATE_USER, O.UPDATE_USER, O.CREATE_TIME, O.UPDATE_TIME, O.LOCK_VERSION, O.COMPANY_NAME, O.BIZ_TYPE, O.RESV1, O.RESV2, O.RESV3, O.RESV4, O.RESV5, O.RESV6 FROM TB_BATCH_ORDER O WHERE O.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BATCH_ORDER (ORDER_ID, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, ORDER_NAME, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_STAT, DATA_STAT, REMARKS, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, LOCK_VERSION, COMPANY_NAME, BIZ_TYPE, RESV1, RESV2, RESV3, RESV4, RESV5, RESV6 ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{orderStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, sysdate, '0', #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resv1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resv2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resv3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resv4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resv5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resv6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BATCH_ORDER SET DATA_STAT = '1',LOCK_VERSION=LOCK_VERSION+1 WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
mapper.select: select c.external_id from TB_PERSON_INF p left join tb_channel_user_inf c on p.user_id = c.user_id where c.channel_code = '40001010' and p.data_stat = '0' and c.data_stat = '0' and p.mobile_phone_no = #{phoneNo}
